Token.Abstract: Describes required methods for requesting entities from the Kinvey Service.
Called when a request fails for some reason (including network failure, internal server failure, request issues...)

Parameter.Name: collection
Parameter.Abstract: The collection attempting to perform the operation.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: An object that encodes our error message

Token.Abstract: Called when a request completes successfully.

Parameter.Name: collection
Parameter.Abstract: The collection attempting to perform the operation.

Parameter.Name: result
Parameter.Abstract: An NSArray of Class objectTemplate objects.
